name: The Ouija Resurrection
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Winning a horror night experience at a theater turns deadly when a group of friends play with a Ouija board, inadvertently summoning a bloodthirsty spirit who goes on a gruesome killing spree.
about_the_game: Winning a horror night experience at a theater turns deadly when a group of friends play with a Ouija board, inadvertently summoning a bloodthirsty spirit who goes on a gruesome killing spree.
short_description: Winning a horror night experience at a theater turns deadly when a group of friends play with a Ouija board, inadvertently summoning a bloodthirsty spirit who goes on a gruesome killing spree.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
